text: Bardovka () is a rural locality (a selo) in Matveyevsky Selsoviet, Kushnarenkovsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 339 as of 2010. There are 3 streets. == Geography == It is located 16 km from Kushnarenkovo, 12 km from Starobaskakovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Kushnarenkovsky District
title: Bardovka
